title: Ep. 716 Who Is the Source?
description:
Summary:
Major breaking news yesterday about the plot to set up Trump, the media cover-up, and alleged payments to Trump’s attorney.
 
News Picks:
A 2016 piece about troubling ties between the Clinton team and a Russian oligarch targeted by Mueller. 
 
Why was the Clinton team hiding its relationship with Pinchuk? 
 
NBC is reporting on payments to Trump’s attorney, but the payments are from a Russian connected to the Clintons. 
 
More on Pinchuk’s connections to the Clintons. 
 
Devastating piece about DOJ efforts to hide a Mueller source. Who’s the source?
 
How did Stormy Daniels’ attorney get the bank records? 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
